profile:
AGM Renovations experts provide quality basement and Bathroom Renovation services throughout the GTA and the surrounding area. See our Service Area for the complete list of towns where our  renovation services are offered. We offer 100% satisfaction guarantee on our workmanship and offer competitive prices with exceptional quality.

Expect more and when you need the best; trust AGM Renovations. We guarantee that you will be completely satisfied, which means that you don't pay until you are satisfied.
Our mission is to be committed to excel in the work we do. We are committed to excel and maintain a sense of pride in our all we do!

services:
AGM Renovations offers Complete basement and Bathroom renovations packages from the professional design through the professional cleaning including:

Drywall- We employ only professional drywall installers and our goal is deliver complete satisfaction to each and every client with the quality of our workmanship and our prompt, reliable service.
    
Taping- Our drywall taping techniques will bring a high quality smooth finish, with a level of excellence you will take pride in.

Painting- We include all wall priming, painting of ceilings, baseboards, casing, crown and cove moldings into our basement construction packages
    
High Grade Laminate Flooring- is standard in our basement renovations packages.

Tiling- Shower, bathroom, or kitchenette tiling will be done by professional tile installers who are employed directly by AGM. A 2 year unlimited warranty is provided to you standard when you finish your basement with AGM
   
Plumbing- Our licensed plumbers will ensure that no problem is left unsolved and you can be sure that any drain or other plumbing defects left by the original house builder will be fixed effectively.

Electrical- We are committed to providing fully licensed electrician service as part of our standard package. Should you ever require an electrical certificate when you decide to sell your property, we will be happy to provide it to you

AGM Basements, Basement finishing, Basement Renovations, Basement Reno, Finishing Basements, Basement Company, Finished Basements, Basement Expert, Finished Basements Company

Kovar Contracting provides roofing, siding, eavestrough and soffit/fascia services in the greater Ottawa area.

We provide high quality service and workmanship using the best available products. We Offer a 50 year non-prorated warranty on all shingle roofs.

For a limited time, we are offering 50% off gutter guard with eavestrough installation!

Our services include:
Free estimates
Re-roofing
New construction roofing
Ventilation installation
Flashing replacement
Skylight installation and replacement
Seamless evestrough installation

profile:
Penguin Basements is your full-service Basement Renovation Company. 

Nothing beats a finished basement as a cost-effective way to add living space or rental income to your home in the Greater Toronto Region. Whether you need design, permits or a stunning build, be sure to call the Renomark certified contractor Penguin for a Free Estimate today.

You'll find hundreds of our satisfied customers all across Southern Ontario in the GTA, the Tri-Cities Area and the Greater Ottawa Area. Our experienced, trained professionals make it easy for Penguin Basements to stand behind every job we do. So, If there's a basement renovation in your future, contact Penguin Basements today, where 100% total satisfaction is guaranteed! Don't get scammed by fly-by-night operators, unrealistically low prices, too short build times or fake reviews. We invite you to visit us in person anytime.

• Basement Renovation Specialist
• Guaranteed Mold-Resistant Materials
• FREE In-Home Design & Estimate
• Easy Financing Available
• No Interest for 12 Months*
• Transferable Limited Lifetime Material Warranty
• 2-Year Comprehensive Warranty
• Exclusive Penguin Benefits

Be sure to check our one of our Basement Showcase Open House weekends where you can inspect our work up close and in person!

profile:
The Anything Guys was founded in 2005 by Tom Rheaume. It has since grown to a strong 10 person team. 
 
Our focus is to supply Ottawa residents with a professional, affordable service that is a one-stop shop for both commercial and residential clients, specializing in pretty much anything! We pride ourselves in our ability to offer a large variety of different household and property related services, big or small, irregular or mainstream, which can be found on our services page. 

This is what you receive with every job you book with us: 
 
Convenience: One number, one main contact and an experienced team to handle most any home and garden renovation and maintenance need. 

Quality Work: Qualified tradesmen who will do the work diligently and to the highest standards
Reliability & Consistency: Good communication is very important to us. If a customer changes the scope of work, we notify them of changes to timelines, schedules and budgets. 

Customer Service: Enjoy a positive experience working with TAG.  

Fair pricing that comes with full Insurance: Our pricing is competitive and we are fully insurued which means you aren't at risk when hiring us for your renovation or landscaping work.
name: The Anything Guys

profile:
OGC - Ottawa General Contractors are leaders as Ottawa's design and build renovation experts. Specializing in home renovations, new and custom home construction as well as home design. With our project management and coordination, we're able to efficiently juggle more jobs, large and small, without dropping the ball. 

Ottawa General Contractors are an accredited business with the Ottawa BBB and our CEO, Moe Abbas is a former member of the board of directors for the Better Business Bureau (BBB).. Our skills and expert service has allowed us to expand to other cities in Canada including Vancouver and Calgary in less than 8 years making us one of the fastest growing construction companies. 

We offer warranty following the Tarion warranty guidelines for all our renovations and construction projects. We also have a design center and in house designers available to help you design and build your home. With over 50 years of experience, our team has the knowledge, the tools, the skill-set and the resources to give you the best value for your dollar at unbeatable service. 

We at Ottawa General Contractors understand that you are looking for value with your renovation services. Trust our team to do it right the first time! Call us directly at (613) 225-9991!

Visit our website for all our credentials and more information.

profile:
My name is Abe, owner at Arama Renos. I've worked as a construction worker with a construction company in Toronto for a few years, it was exciting and helped me establish a clear vision of where I was headed. I then took an amazing job as a warranty Technician with a local builder in Ottawa for some time, then 2019 came and I thought it was time to start my own Home Reno business which was my dream. We opened our doors in 2019 and it has been amazing ever since. We pride ourselves in what we do, our vision is to provide quality work combined with a strong customer service experience, we care about our customers and want to build a long-term relationship with them, a happy homeowner is what keeps us going!

At Arama Renos, we don't rush the work, we make sure to do it right and never cut corners".

profile:
Magnolia Construction prides itself on the ability to listen and anticipate wants and needs. That’s what makes us exceptional at customizing our services to the unique situation of each and every client. We guide your vision through the entire renovation process and ensure that we are on the same page as to the best way to achieve it.

Our team of designers and builders brings expertise in a wide variety of aspects in home remodelling, and our track record of customer satisfaction earns us repeat business and referrals. You’ll find us as attentive and courteous in customer service as in the remodelling work itself.

We’ve transformed many a kitchen in Ottawa, with renovations ranging from islands and new counter tops to knocking down walls and changing the entire dynamic to a more contemporary space. Our extensive experience in kitchen renovations means you’re getting highly skilled craftsmanship to execute an exquisite transformation. Our clients give us rave reviews and have great things to say about the renovations we’ve done for the kitchens and other living spaces.

Our bathroom renovations deliver quality results, on time and on budget. We’ll work with you to create an upgraded bathroom that makes you want to linger for a while, light a candle and relax. We’ve remodeled countless bathrooms in Ottawa homes, from counters and sinks to showers & tubs to tile floors. We leave no stone unturned when we executive a renovation, keeping your full satisfaction in mind at every measurement, cut and fitting.

Magnolia will transform your basement from “blah” to “wow.” We’ll work with you to design and deliver a functional, livable basement space that your family (or your tenant) will truly enjoy. We have a knack for translating visions into reality. Talk to Magnolia about how we can work together to build a dream basement. When it comes to basements there’s no need to aim low. You deserve the best quality renovation. Magnolia can make that happen.
services: Bathroom renovations, kitchen renovations, basement renovations, additions, general contracting, landscaping, decks
name: Magnolia Construction

Welcome

We make your renovation dreams come true!

Capolavoro Renovation is an experienced company with professional tradesmen specializing in exterior/interior residential. We think outside the box and offer suggestions based on the latest trends.

What makes us different from all the other renovation companies? We listen to our customers, understand that everybody has their own style and need to personalize their own space.We also try to work within your budget.

Working with you, we create innovative environments from finished basements, renovating kitchens, bathrooms, bedrooms, in-law suites and much more.

Making your outside come to life! Our team of professional carpenters will build fences, decks, sheds, design and install interlock walkways, patios and much more.

At Capolavoro Renovation Inc. you are our priority. Our dedication and commitment will showcase a professional job well done with great results!!! 

Satisfaction guaranteed!

Our goal: 

To provide 100% customer quality satisfaction while targeting our customers’ needs and working within their budget.

Your Needs, Your Ideas, Your Dream!

profile: Homesmiths Inc. was founded in 1995 to provide the kind of service Tony Smith believed should always be available to everyone. Tony has 30 years of experience and his skill and expertise is brought to every project. This ensures peace of mind to the home owners that the work will be done correctly the first time and always using best practices. Tony believes in earning and maintaining a good relationship and mutual respect between his clients and himself. This trust and interpersonal relationship is easily lost when dealing with a larger company or general contractors who will just assign people to work on your project and is rarely seen afterwards. Tony specializes in complete Kitchen, Bathroom and Basement renovations and can assist you in any aspect from flooring, lighting, restructuring walls, windows, plumbing, electrical, new sinks or shower enhancements. Homesmiths Inc. can assist in getting all required documentation and materials needed for your renovation. Please visit our website and see how we can assist in meeting your renovation goals. www.homesmithsinc.com

profile:
Holland Homes and Renovations is Ottawa’s preferred home renovation and home addition contractor. As the recipient of the 2017 Consumer Choice Award for Home Improvement Contractor in the Ottawa area, we know the importance of delivering the highest level of customer service and value for your home renovation or addition. 

Serving the Ottawa area since 2010, we specialize in tailoring each project to the customer’s budget and specifications. We strive to provide a seamless experience as the customer deals directly with the owner and project leader every step of the way. 

We don’t make it complicated: our focus is on you and your vision. That means not only a more personal, direct experience, but a more affordable one as well. 

From budget to design to finalization, we specialize in all areas of home renovation: home additions, basement renovations, zoning and project approval, kitchens and bathrooms, roofing, windows, painting and flooring. If the project calls for it, we can handle it. 
 
Visit our website to view customer testimonials, project inspiration and our frequently updated blog on the challenges, regulations and benefits of home renovation in Ottawa. 
Contact us today and let’s get started on your home renovation dreams in Ottawa!

profile:
Founded in 2018, GrandCor is a construction project management company featuring a management team with over 20 years of experience providing bespoke, cradle-to-grave construction and building solutions as well as property management for a diverse range of commercial, retail and public sector clients across Canada. 
.
GrandCor embraces complexity across the project lifecycle and differentiates itself as an organization through an unapologetic focus on execution for the exclusive benefit of our clients. GrandCor's defining qualities as a leader in construction project management include: 

  • Transparency and client-focus ‒ Providing our clients with best-in-class service and outcomes is driven by our transparent approach to client engagement where we “do what we say and say what we do.” Anything less is unacceptable. 
  • An established track record ‒ GrandCor has an established track record of performance in providing tailored construction and building service solutions and project management engagements for diverse clients across their entire project lifecycle. 
  • A forward-thinking approach ‒ GrandCor’s key differentiating feature is its forward-thinking approach to its operations, implementing cutting edge technology, design trends and development techniques. We provide the most creative solutions for the unique specifications of each client. 
  • An experienced team ‒ GrandCor’s management team features over 20 years of comprehensive construction project management experience across Canada, with deep exposure to the full project construction lifecycle. We have encountered a complex range of commercial and residential projects of varying stage, scale and performance 
.
The GrandCor team looks forward to addressing your specific project-based needs and exceeding your expectations on-time and on-budget. We have a broad range of client references available upon request. In addition, we offer first-time client incentives in and no-obligation estimates. 
.
For more information and a comprehensive overview of our capabilities and projects, please contact us at info@GrandCor.ca and visit our website: http://www.GrandCor.ca
